thread.title: Ashlee
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Ashlee

author: Ashlee
title: Ashlee
text: I went in to get new tires for my car , talked to a very helpful employee his name was Eric , he explained all the tire options and what the benifits of town fair tire were . He was Very polite and helpful overall great service from him !! . The wait was 2 and a half hours which was a bit long but they told me how long it would Be which took the exact time which was very nice . They are super nice and explain everything for you , showing options of rim deals too when I mentioned rims :) would recommend
